Title: Evaluates the safety of driving while wearing glasses capable of accessing the internet and mobile technology and related prohibitions
Summary: Evaluates the safety of driving while wearing glasses or contacts capable of accessing the internet and mobile technology; prohibits such use.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to evaluating and ensuring the safety of driving with regard to wearing glasses or contacts capable of accessing the internet and mobile technology; and in relation to prohibiting the use of such glasses or contacts while driving
